A

AES - Class in pt.ulisboa.tecnico.sirs.security
Defines methods to encrypt and decrypt data using Java AES implementation Uses AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding AES cipher, and SHA1PRNG to generate secure random IVs
AES() - Constructor for class pt.ulisboa.tecnico.sirs.security.AES
 
App - Class in pt.ulisboa.tecnico.sirs
 
App() - Constructor for class pt.ulisboa.tecnico.sirs.App
 
Authorization - Class in pt.ulisboa.tecnico.sirs.authorization
This is an abstract class that defines an authorization Authorizations are signed by hospitals, and assure that the request being made is valid NHS verifies the validity of the digital signature, and if its valid fulfills the request, otherwise rejects
Authorization(Certificate, Certificate, Certificate, byte[]) - Constructor for class pt.ulisboa.tecnico.sirs.authorization.Authorization
 
authorizeFetchRecord(Doctor, Patient) - Method in class pt.ulisboa.tecnico.sirs.Hospital
This method returns a signed authorization that the NHS will accept

This method returns a signed authorization that the NHS will accept

F

FetchAuthorization - Class in pt.ulisboa.tecnico.sirs.authorization
This is an class that defines a fetch authorization Fetch authorizations are signed by hospitals, and assure that the fetch request being made is valid NHS verifies the validity of the digital signature, and if its valid fulfills the request, otherwise rejects

S

SecureDataStore - Class in pt.ulisboa.tecnico.sirs.data
This class implements the Interface DataStore All patient records are properly encrypted with the NHS symmetric key Records have different IV (Initialization Vector) to improve security, giving use of CBC-AES

SecureRecord extends Record, and fulfills integrity and authenticity requirements for patient records
